body: When will the new jr mods be out because i have been waiting a few months for this now. please reply asap
body_tagged: When will the new jr mods be out because i have been waiting a few months for this now. please reply asap
title: When will the new jr mods be out

replies.body: If you mean "When will the next staff applications be open?", I would assume it would be in a few months. However, there is no confirmed date and only time will tell.
replies.body_tagged: If you mean "When will the next staff applications be open?", I would assume it would be in a few months. However, there is no confirmed date and only time will tell.

replies.body: All the new junior mods have been already promoted. Staff applications will probably open up again in some months as kycrafft said.
replies.body_tagged: All the new junior mods have been already promoted. Staff applications will probably open up again in some months as kycrafft said.

replies.body: In a couple of months, most likely during the fall.
replies.body_tagged: In a couple of months, most likely during the fall.

replies.body: Staff Apps will open when we need more mods.
replies.body_tagged: Staff Apps will open when we need more mods.

replies.body:
Seeing this question has been answered I'm going to take the incentive of locking this post. 

Stay in touch on the forums for any future news regarding staff applications.
